name: zammad
description: Zammad is a self-hosted helpdesk and ticketing system. It integrates with email, chat, and telephony, supports multi-channel tickets, and exposes a modern web UI and APIs, alongside commercial cloud hosting.
features: Multi-channel ticketing: Manage support requests from email, chat, phone, and social media in one unified interface.
Email integration: Convert incoming emails to tickets automatically with threading and attachment handling.
Knowledge base: Build a searchable help center with articles that can be linked to tickets or accessed by customers.
Ticket workflows: Automate ticket routing, assignment, and status changes based on customizable rules and triggers.
Agent collaboration: Add internal notes, mention colleagues, and collaborate on tickets without exposing details to customers.
SLA management: Define and track service level agreements with automatic escalations for overdue tickets.
Customer portal: Provide a self-service interface where customers can submit tickets and track their status.
Reporting dashboard: Analyze ticket volume, response times, and agent performance with built-in analytics.
Text modules: Create reusable response templates for common questions to improve agent efficiency.
Time tracking: Log time spent on tickets for billing, reporting, and workload analysis.
Mobile apps: Access tickets and respond to customers from iOS and Android devices with native applications.
API access: Integrate with external systems and automate ticket creation using comprehensive REST APIs.
